tool_description: This API features the download of various pinterest medias, such as images, carousels (reels), videos and GIFs.
name: Pinterest Any Media Downloader
title: Pinterest Any Media Downloader

api_list.name: Retrieve media by Pinterest URL
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the media URL(s) belonging to the given Pinterest URL. The variable *multi_media* indicates whether multiple media URLs exist to a given Pin. If so, the variable *media* is an object instead of a string.
